name: iOS 15.2 and iPadOS 15.2
available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)

advisories.impact: Parsing a maliciously crafted audio file may lead to disclosure of user information
advisories.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.impact: User traffic might unexpectedly be leaked to a proxy server despite PAC configurations

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted image may lead to arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: A memory corruption issue in the processing of ICC profiles was addressed with improved input validation.

advisories.impact: A local attacker may be able to elevate their privileges
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved checks.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An attacker with physical access to a device may be able to see private contact information
advisories.description: A lock screen issue allowed access to contacts on a locked device. This issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A user in a FaceTime call may unexpectedly leak sensitive user information through Live Photos metadata
advisories.description: This issue was addressed with improved handling of file metadata.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted font may result in the disclosure of process memory
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds read was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to read sensitive contact information
advisories.description: A permissions issue was addressed with improved validation.

advisories.description: A buffer overflow issue was addressed with improved memory handling.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: A sender's email address may be leaked when sending an S/MIME encrypted email using a certificate with more than one email address
advisories.description: A S/MIME issue existed in the handling of encrypted email. This issue was addressed with improved selection of the encryption certificate.

cves.credit: Benjamin Ehrfeld of CISPA Helmholtz Center for Information Security

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: An attacker may be able to recover plaintext contents of an S/MIME-encrypted e-mail
advisories.description: A S/MIME issue existed in the handling of encrypted email. This issue was addressed by not automatically loading some MIME parts.

cves.credit: Damian Poddebniak of Münster University of Applied Sciences, Christian Dresen of Münster University of Applied Sciences, Jens Müller of Ruhr University Bochum, Fabian Ising of Münster University of Applied Sciences, Sebastian Schinzel of Münster University of Applied Sciences, Simon Friedberger of KU Leuven, Juraj Somorovsky of Ruhr University Bochum, Jörg Schwenk of Ruhr University Bochum

advisories.impact: A malicious user may be able to leave a messages group but continue to receive messages in that group
advisories.description: An issue in the handling of group membership was resolved with improved logic.

advisories.available: iPhone 6s and later, iPad Pro (all models), iPad Air 2 and later, iPad 5th generation and later, iPad mini 4 and later, and iPod touch (7th generation)
advisories.impact: Multiple issues in HDF5
advisories.description: Multiple issues were addressed by removing HDF5.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted USD file may lead to unexpected application termination or arbitrary code execution
advisories.description: An out-of-bounds write issue was addressed with improved bounds checking.

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted file may disclose user information

advisories.impact: Processing a maliciously crafted USD file may disclose memory contents

advisories.impact: A person with physical access to an iOS device may be able to access contacts from the lock screen
advisories.description: The issue was addressed with improved permissions logic.

advisories.impact: A person with physical access to an iOS device may be able to access stored passwords without authentication
advisories.description: An inconsistent user interface issue was addressed with improved state management.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to elevate privileges

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to bypass certain Privacy preferences
advisories.description: A validation issue related to hard link behavior was addressed with improved sandbox restrictions.

advisories.impact: A malicious application may be able to bypass certain Privacy preferences

advisories.impact: A malicious app may be able to access data from other apps by enabling additional logging
